:github_url: https://github.com/mickeystroller/SynSetMine-pytorch

SynSetMine documentation!
======================================

This project presents a distantly-supervised synonym set discovery tool. 

Details about SynSetMine can be accessed `here <https://arxiv.org/pdf/1811.07032.pdf>`_, and the implementation is based on PyTorch 0.4.1.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 4
   :caption: Package Reference

   model
